structure.unit: B LICENSURE AND REGULATION OF HEALTH FACILITIES AND SERVICES

law.catch_line: Authorization for two 120-bed nursing homes in western and eastern Kentucky.
law.text: The General Assembly hereby approves and authorizes the construction and operation of two (2) one hundred twenty (120) bed nursing homes, one in western Kentucky and the other in eastern Kentucky.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 223, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1998.
